ai-patthana12.5:0.2_0: At the place where the nature of the Dhamma is used, unqualified,
ai-patthana12.5:1.1_0: It’s not possible to give a teaching to someone else, or to have no cause or reason for one reason.
ai-patthana12.5:3.1_0: or dealing with it for the sake of a teaching,
ai-patthana12.5:4.1_0: mind is not associated with it ...
ai-patthana12.5:5.1_0: It’s not easy to calculate the teaching consciously.
ai-patthana12.5:6.1_0: You shouldn’t recite the teaching with your mind. ...
ai-patthana12.5:7.1_0: You shouldn’t give a teaching that’s embarrassed by the mind. ...
ai-patthana12.5:7.1_1: He is not able to teach Dhamma to the eighteen mental preceding the mind.
ai-patthana12.5:7.1_2: or because of a mind that’s rolling on to the wrong way.
ai-patthana12.5:8.1_0: Not for the sake of himself,
ai-patthana12.5:9.1_0: it’s not possible to give a teaching to someone elsewhere, or to have one cause and reasonedness.
ai-patthana12.5:12.1_0: It’s not easy for someone to give the teaching, nor to reckoned as a single cause.
ai-patthana12.5:13.1_0: You shouldn’t give rise to confidence in those without it. ...
